org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.ruby

Class RubyXref

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.JFlexStateStacker
      • org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.JFlexSymbolMatcher
        • org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.ruby.RubyXref
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JFlexJointLexer, JFlexLexer, JFlexStackingLexer, Resettable, ScanningSymbolMatcher, SymbolMatchedPublisher

    public class RubyXref
extends JFlexSymbolMatcher
    This class is a scanner generated by JFlex 1.7.0 from the specification file /home/travis/build/oracle/opengrok/opengrok-indexer/target/jflex-sources/RubyXref.lex

      Calls JFlexJointLexer.phLOC() if the yystate is not SCOMMENT or POD.

      Indicates the closing of an open tag and the opening -- if className is non-null -- of a new one.

      void hqopPunc(String capture)
      Begins a quote-like state for a heuristic match of the shorthand // of m// where the capture ends with "/", begins with punctuation, and the intervening whitespace may contain LFs -- and writes the parts to output.
      void hqopSymbol(String capture)
      Begins a quote-like state for a heuristic match of the shorthand // of m// where the capture ends with "/", begins with an initial symbol, and the intervening whitespace may contain LFs -- and writes the parts to output.
      void interpop()
      Resets the interpolation counter to 1.
      boolean maybeEndHere(String capture)
      Process the capture, possibly ending the Here-document state just beforehand.

      Determine if the interpolation should end based on the first character of capture, recognizing tokens that increase the nesting level instead.
      boolean maybeEndQuote(String capture)
      Determine if the quote should end based on the first character of capture, recognizing quote-like operators that allow nesting to increase the nesting level if appropriate.
      void maybeIntraState()
      If the state is YYINITIAL, then transitions to INTRA; otherwise does nothing, because other transitions would have saved the state.
      boolean maybeStartHere()
      Pushes the first Here-document state if any declarations were parsed, or else does nothing.

      Subtract the number of initial, non-word characters from the length of capture.

                           int captureOffset,
                           boolean ignoreKwd)
                    throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: JFlexJointLexer
        Passes a text fragment that is syntactically a symbol for processing.
        Parameters:
        value - the excised symbol
        captureOffset - the offset from yychar where value began
        ignoreKwd - a value indicating whether keywords should be ignored
        Returns:
        true if the value was not in keywords or if the ignoreKwd was true
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while accepting

                   throws IOException

      • yyreset

        public final void yyreset(Reader reader)
        Resets the scanner to read from a new input stream. Does not close the old reader. All internal variables are reset, the old input stream cannot be reused (internal buffer is discarded and lost). Lexical state is set to ZZ_INITIAL. Internal scan buffer is resized down to its initial length, if it has grown.
        Parameters:
        reader - the new input stream

      • yystate

        public final int yystate()
        Returns the current lexical state.
        Returns:
        "the current lexical state of the scanner."

      • yycharat

        public final char yycharat(int pos)
        Returns the character at position pos from the matched text. It is equivalent to yytext().charAt(pos), but faster
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the character to fetch. A value from 0 to yylength()-1.
        Returns:
        the character at position pos

      • yylength

        public final int yylength()
        Returns the length of the matched text region.
        Returns:
        "the length of the matched input text region (does not require a String object to be created)"

      • yypushback

        public void yypushback(int number)
        Pushes the specified amount of characters back into the input stream. They will be read again by then next call of the scanning method
        Parameters:
        number - the number of characters to be read again. This number must not be greater than yylength()!

          throws IOException

        Returns:
        the next token
        Throws:
        IOException - if any I/O-Error occurs

      • maybeEndQuote

        public boolean maybeEndQuote(String capture)
        Determine if the quote should end based on the first character of capture, recognizing quote-like operators that allow nesting to increase the nesting level if appropriate.

        Calling this method has side effects to possibly modify nqchar, waitq, or endqchar.

        Returns:
        true if the quote state should end

        Gets a value indicating if modifiers are OK at the end of the last quote-like operator.
        Returns:

      • hqopPunc

        public void hqopPunc(String capture)
              throws IOException
        Begins a quote-like state for a heuristic match of the shorthand // of m// where the capture ends with "/", begins with punctuation, and the intervening whitespace may contain LFs -- and writes the parts to output.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • hqopSymbol

        public void hqopSymbol(String capture)
                throws IOException
        Begins a quote-like state for a heuristic match of the shorthand // of m// where the capture ends with "/", begins with an initial symbol, and the intervening whitespace may contain LFs -- and writes the parts to output.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • hop

        public void hop(String capture)
         throws IOException
        Parses a Here-document declaration, and takes the capture using JFlexJointLexer.offer(java.lang.String). If the declaration is valid, hereSettings will have been appended.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • maybeStartHere

        public boolean maybeStartHere()
                       throws IOException
        Pushes the first Here-document state if any declarations were parsed, or else does nothing.
        Returns:
        true if a Here state was pushed
        Throws:
        IOException

      • maybeEndHere

        public boolean maybeEndHere(String capture)
                     throws IOException
        Process the capture, possibly ending the Here-document state just beforehand.
        Returns:
        true if the quote state ended
        Throws:
        IOException

      • interpop

        public void interpop()
        Resets the interpolation counter to 1.

      • maybeEndInterpolation

        public boolean maybeEndInterpolation(String capture)
                              throws IOException
        Determine if the interpolation should end based on the first character of capture, recognizing tokens that increase the nesting level instead.

        Calling this method has side effects to possibly modify nendbrace.

        Returns:
        true if the interpolation state should end
        Throws:
        IOException

        public int nameLength(String capture)
        Subtract the number of initial, non-word characters from the length of capture.
        Parameters:
        capture - a defined value
        Returns:
        the length of value minus the number of initial, non-word characters

      • getCollateralCapturePattern

        public Pattern getCollateralCapturePattern()
        Gets a pattern to match the collateral capture for the current quoting state or null if there is no active quoting state.
        Returns:
        a defined pattern or null

      • chkLOC

        public void chkLOC()
        Calls JFlexJointLexer.phLOC() if the yystate is not SCOMMENT or POD.
